description: This modpack has the **Nifty Carts mod** which adds a bunch of useful carts to attach to your horse. The wheel is required for all of these recipes, so be sure to craft as much as you need.
To use the cart, place it down, then while riding your horse, go near the cart and press /e/**[y]**/e/ on your keyboard to --attach it--. Pressing the button again will --detach it-- as well.
As a reward for this quest, you will receive some golden carrots. You can use these for your own food or to breed horses.
